titleStmt.title: The ravens almanacke foretelling of a [brace] plague, famine, and ciuill warre, that shall happen this present yeare 1609, not only within this kingdome of Great Britaine, but also in France, Germany, Spaine, and other parts of Christendome : with certaine remedies, rules, and receipts, how to preuent or at least to abate the edge of these vniuersall calamities.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

titleStmt.title: The ravens almanacke foretelling of a [brace] plague, famine, and ciuill warre, that shall happen this present yeare 1609, not only within this kingdome of Great Britaine, but also in France, Germany, Spaine, and other parts of Christendome : with certaine remedies, rules, and receipts, how to preuent or at least to abate the edge of these vniuersall calamities.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.A. for Thomas Archer, and arto bee solde at his shop in the Popes-head-pallace nere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Thomas Archer, and arto bee solde
